pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bonsai Gym Common=================A python library for integrating Bonsai BRAIN with Open AI Gym environments.Installation------------Install the latest stable from PyPI:`$ pip install bonsai-gym`Usage-----Once installed, import `bonsai_gym` in order to accessbase class `GymSimulator`, which implements all of theenvironment-independent Bonsai SDK integrations necessary totrain a Bonsai BRAIN to play an OpenAI Gym simulator.:: import gym from bonsai_gym import GymSimulator class CartPoleSimulator(GymSimulator): # Perform cartpole-specific integrations here.
